20101222040512.000|20101222040513.000|CC1|MILLION BUSINESSES, BUT THE     
20101222040513.000|20101222040514.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE GREATER NEW    
20101222040514.000|20101222040516.000|CC1|YORK CHAMBER OF COMMERCE TOLD

20101222040518.000|20101222040520.000|CC1|9/11 BILL, HAVING BEEN DOWN

20101222040522.000|20101222040523.000|CC1|VERY NECESSARY AND I HOPE THE   
20101222040523.000|20101222040526.000|CC1|U.S. SENATE PASSES IT.          
20101222040526.000|20101222040528.000|CC1|WITH US NOW IS T.J. GILLMORE, A 
20101222040528.000|20101222040530.000|CC1|CEMENT MASON WHO WENT TO GROUND 
20101222040530.000|20101222040533.000|CC1|ZERO DAY ONE AND STAYED FOR TWO 
20101222040533.000|20101222040535.000|CC1|WEEKS.                          
20101222040535.000|20101222040536.000|CC1|HE LOST 30% OF LUNG CAPACITY, IS
20101222040536.000|20101222040537.000|CC1|NOW LOBBYING FOR THE PASSAGE OF 
20101222040537.000|20101222040539.000|CC1|THE BILL.                       
20101222040539.000|20101222040540.000|CC1|T.J., THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR   
20101222040540.000|20101222040541.000|CC1|JOINING US TONIGHT.             
20101222040541.000|20101222040542.000|CC1|I APPRECIATE IT.                
20101222040542.000|20101222040544.000|CC1|>> IT'S NO PROBLEM.             
20101222040544.000|20101222040546.000|CC1|IT WAS NOTHING.

20101222040552.000|20101222040554.000|CC1|ALL OF THE SUDDEN THEY ALL      
20101222040554.000|20101222040556.000|CC1|FORGOT.                         
20101222040556.000|20101222040558.000|CC1|>> T.J., YOU MADE HEADLINES IN  
20101222040558.000|20101222040559.000|CC1|NEW YORK FOR YOUR EXCHANGE WITH 
20101222040559.000|20101222040600.000|CC1|SENATOR McCAIN ON THIS ISSUE.   
20101222040600.000|20101222040604.000|CC1|CAN YOU SHARE THE STORY WITH US?
20101222040604.000|20101222040608.000|CC1|>> I HAD BEEN DOWN -- I CAME    
20101222040608.000|20101222040609.000|CC1|DOWN TO WASHINGTON -- IT WAS TWO
20101222040609.000|20101222040611.000|CC1|WEEKS AGO.

20101222040613.000|20101222040615.000|CC1|DOWN WITH MY COUSIN MATTHEW WHO 
20101222040615.000|20101222040616.000|CC1|TEACHES DOWN HERE AT, I THINK   
20101222040616.000|20101222040617.000|CC1|IT'S ST. JOHNS.                 
20101222040617.000|20101222040622.000|CC1|I WAS BY MYSELF WALKING AROUND  
20101222040622.000|20101222040625.000|CC1|THE SENATE LOBBY THAT THIS BILL 
20101222040625.000|20101222040628.000|CC1|WAS TO PASS.                    
20101222040628.000|20101222040629.000|CC1|I SPENT A COUPLE OF DAYS AND    
20101222040629.000|20101222040631.000|CC1|EVERY TIME I WENT INTO McCAIN'S 
20101222040631.000|20101222040633.000|CC1|OFFICE THEY KEPT GIVING ME,     
20101222040633.000|20101222040634.000|CC1|PLEASE, HERE'S AN E-MAIL        
20101222040634.000|20101222040638.000|CC1|ADDRESS.                        
20101222040638.000|20101222040641.000|CC1|SEND YOUR REQUEST IN TO US.     
20101222040641.000|20101222040642.000|CC1|I STARTED HAVING BREATHING      
20101222040642.000|20101222040643.000|CC1|PROBLEMS ABOUT 3:00 IN THE      
20101222040643.000|20101222040645.000|CC1|AFTERNOON.                      
20101222040645.000|20101222040646.000|CC1|I WAS TIRED.                    
20101222040646.000|20101222040648.000|CC1|AND I WALKED OVER AND I WAS     
20101222040648.000|20101222040650.000|CC1|LOOKING OVER THE ROTUNDA IN THE 
20101222040650.000|20101222040654.000|CC1|RUSSELL BUILDING AT THE POLICE  
20101222040654.000|20101222040656.000|CC1|SHIELDS WHICH I HAD BEEN TO WITH
20101222040656.000|20101222040657.000|CC1|POLICE COMMISSIONER KELLY AND I 
20101222040657.000|20101222040700.000|CC1|WAS INVITED TO THAT.            
20101222040700.000|20101222040701.000|CC1|I LOOKED TO MY LEFT AND WHO WAS 
20101222040701.000|20101222040703.000|CC1|STANDING AT THE ELEVATOR BUT    
20101222040703.000|20101222040706.000|CC1|SENATOR McCAIN.                 
20101222040706.000|20101222040708.000|CC1|WITH THAT, I STEPPED IN FRONT OF
20101222040708.000|20101222040710.000|CC1|THE SENATOR, INTRODUCED MYSELF  
20101222040710.000|20101222040713.000|CC1|AND I SAYS, SENATOR, I HOPE WE  
20101222040713.000|20101222040714.000|CC1|CAN HAVE YOUR SUPPORT ON THE    
20101222040714.000|20101222040716.000|CC1|9/11 ZADROGA BILL.              
20101222040716.000|20101222040718.000|CC1|HE TURNED AROUND AND SAID TO ME,
20101222040718.000|20101222040721.000|CC1|THANK YOU FOR YOUR SERVICE.     
20101222040721.000|20101222040722.000|CC1|THERE IS NOTHING I CAN DO.      
20101222040722.000|20101222040724.000|CC1|AND HE JUMPED RIGHT AROUND ME   
20101222040724.000|20101222040726.000|CC1|AND JUMPED ONTO THE ELEVATOR.   
20101222040726.000|20101222040727.000|CC1|THIS ALL TOOK A MATTER OF ABOUT 
20101222040727.000|20101222040730.000|CC1|15 SECONDS.

20101222045103.000|20101222045105.000|CC1|FAVORITES OF 2010 NEXT.         
20101222045105.000|20101222045409.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101222045105.000|20101222045106.000|CC1|                       wake...  
20101222045106.000|20101222045106.000|CC1|         sleep is here,         
20101222045106.000|20101222045110.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101222045110.000|20101222045110.000|CC1|    And if you wake up often    
20101222045110.000|20101222045113.000|CC1|  in the middle of the night... 
20101222045113.000|20101222045113.000|CC1|          rest is here,         
20101222045113.000|20101222045116.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101222045116.000|20101222045116.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20101222045116.000|20101222045119.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20101222045119.000|20101222045119.000|CC1|           so you can           
20101222045119.000|20101222045122.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20101222045122.000|20101222045122.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20101222045122.000|20101222045124.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20101222045124.000|20101222045126.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101222045126.000|20101222045126.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101222045126.000|20101222045129.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101222045129.000|20101222045129.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101222045129.000|20101222045131.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101222045131.000|20101222045133.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20101222045133.000|20101222045133.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20101222045133.000|20101222045135.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101222045135.000|20101222045137.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20101222045137.000|20101222045137.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20101222045137.000|20101222045139.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20101222045139.000|20101222045139.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20101222045139.000|20101222045141.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20101222045141.000|20101222045141.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20101222045141.000|20101222045143.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20101222045143.000|20101222045143.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20101222045143.000|20101222045145.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20101222045145.000|20101222045147.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20101222045147.000|20101222045147.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20101222045147.000|20101222045150.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20101222045150.000|20101222045150.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20101222045150.000|20101222045152.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20101222045152.000|20101222045152.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20101222045152.000|20101222045155.000|CC1|        is right for you.       
20101222045155.000|20101222045155.000|CC1|         Get Lunesta for
